data.eml:eml: Review of the genus Prosciara Frey (Diptera, Sciaridae) from China

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Shi, Kai, Huang, Junhao, Komarova, Lyudmila, Zhang, Sujiong, Wu, Hong (2013): Review of the genus Prosciara Frey (Diptera, Sciaridae) from China. Zootaxa 3640 (3): 301-342, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3640.3.1
